outline:
1. sin, sinful
  2. sin, sin offering
    1. sin
    2. condition of sin, guilt of sin
    3. punishment for sin
    4. sin-offering
    5. purification from sins of ceremonial uncleanness
kjv_def: punishment (of sin), purifying(-fication for sin), sin(-ner, offering).
strongs_def: an offence (sometimes habitual sinfulness), and its penalty, occasion, sacrifice, or expiation; also (concretely) an offender
